name: Brightest (itch)
description:
The sun is burned out, and all that's left is stored in an orb of light in a temple. You have snuck into the temple to steal the orb and return it to the sky, but must find your way out of the temple in suffocating darkness.

The theme for GMTK Jam 2019 is "Only One". In Brightest, there is only one source of light, which you must use to solve puzzles in an advanced ancient dungeon.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Hold Shift to push or pull
  • Press R twice to restart the level
  • Press Escape twice to exit the level
